cab.content: (This Document iMajesty's Governmflnt.)*s the Property ofCirculated by the Secretary of State for India. SECRET.From Viceroy, lSik February 19J8. (Received 19th February, 10.30 a.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. Baluchistan. Atari tribe lias adopted deliant attitude over supply of recruits for armv which they had previously promised. To avoid possibility of military diversion, recruiting lias been stopped and tribal responsibility will be exaeted for defiant attitude.No change in general military-situation.
